choices.A: results from prior quarter, product roadmap, proposed marketing new products, and confirm goals for the next quarter
choices.B: results from prior quarter, agreed actions completed, benchmarking with the market, and confirm goals for next quarter
choices.D: results from prior quarter, cover roadmap and promote new products, and confirm goals for next quarter
choices.C: results from prior quarter, services delivered, issues and open services cases, and confirm goals for next quarter

choices.A: gap analysis that focuses on the state of the customer's current architecture
choices.D: technical analysis that outlines the implementation plan and adoption barriers
choices.B: new success plan that focuses on the upcoming goals for the customer
choices.C: conversation that outlines the key initiatives that are agreed upon in the success plan

questions.question_text: What is the best reason for documenting your customer's success?

choices.D: To provide expansion opportunities for your sales team
choices.A: To provide awareness of the value achieved by the customer's purchased solution
choices.C: To document roles and responsibilities for your project management
choices.B: To establish KPI's that measure the success of your company's business
